message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You wanted 50/50, I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not being generous
You're not being generous? I'll give you a bit less, but I'm still willing to compromise
You're trying to squeeze me, but I'm not afraid of a little competition!
You're getting aggressive, I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting away with everything
You're playing hardball, I'll play even harder
You're not backing down, neither am I. I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting away with everything
You're not serious, I'll take what I can get
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting a good deal
I'm not desperate, I'm just getting smart
You're getting clever, but I'm not falling for it. I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting away with everything
This is my final offer, take it or leave it
